## Learning to Balance: A Reaction Wheel Unicycle

[![](RLUnicycle/learn-to-balance-cover.jpg)](RLUnicycle/introduction.qmd){.center-image width=80%}

This project focuses on the development and challenges of building and controlling a reaction wheel unicycle. Performed as part of a 2-year long capstone project in the UBC Engineering Physics program, sponsored by the Engineering Physics project lab.
